description:
A lightweight, low-profile pack for fast backcountry shredding. Ideal for single day ripping or in-bounds shredding, the Dawn Patrol 25 provides enough real-estate to stash avalanche gear, daily essentials, and a hydration system. Compatible with the AvaLung™ Element snow safety system, this pack provides just enough room to give you piece of mind when sending backcountry lines.

  • Form fitting suspension system designed specifically for skiing
  • Durable yet lightweight Dynex shoulder straps
  • Zippered access to main compartment is easy to use when pack is set down in the snow
  • Dedicated avalanche tool organizer panel keeps things tidy and where they need to be
  • PickPockets™ house your ice tools for glacier travel
  • Hi-Lo helmet holder handles your lid for sweaty approaches
  • Ski and snowboard carry system tucks away when not in use
  • Front and side compression straps
  • AvaLung™ compatible design. The AvaLung Element device removes without tools
name: Black Diamond Dawn Patrol 25 Backpack - Unisex

value: AvaLung Element ready (AvaLung Element sold separately)
